community.description: Communicate with other users, share ready-made translations and receive technical support
community.title: Join the community
docs.advanced_settings.addVariablesFromD: If true - value variables (such as username) are substituted from the cloud database so that the user does not have to re-translate strings where their value variables differ.
Purpose: Using variable values from a cloud database.
docs.advanced_settings.alternativeSortMe: Used only in prescan during the initial string assembly process. If true - the translator will try to sort the strings by order in the dialog, which may provide a more accurate context-sensitive translation. If false, the order will be ignored and priority will be given to reducing the number of final requests to the service.
Purpose: Using an alternative string sorting method.
docs.advanced_settings.customProxiesBrid: If proxies are enabled in one of the modes where AutoProxy is used, you can specify additional bridges to connect to in this setting. If proxies are not enabled or AutoProxy is not used, the setting is ignored.
Purpose: List of additional bridges for AutoProxy.
docs.advanced_settings.databaseDir.descr: A folder where cloud databases will be recorded after the prescan is completed, so that the user can then share them. If null - the database is written to the game folder. It is recommended to specify a specific folder so that all databases are in one place and are convenient to share.
docs.advanced_settings.databaseDir.name: databaseDir
docs.advanced_settings.deeplLoginData.pu: Purpose: Data for authentication to DeepL when using Selenium.
docs.advanced_settings.deeplLoginData.va: null or an array of two elements [login, password]
docs.advanced_settings.pathToChromeExe.n: Note: In most cases, the path is determined automatically. It is clearly necessary to indicate only at the request of technical support.
docs.advanced_settings.pathToChromeExe.p: Purpose: Path to the browser executable file on the Chromium engine.
docs.advanced_settings.seleniumInputSpli: Purpose: Method of entering text into Selenium.
"all" - the entire text is inserted at once
"strings" - text is entered line by line
"symbols" - the text is entered character by character
"humanTyping" - text is entered character by character with a randomized frequency to simulate a real person
docs.advanced_settings.seleniumStartMode: Important: The recommended option is "hide". In other cases, error reports will not be accepted. Include other modes only upon request for technical support.
Purpose: Browser display mode when using Selenium.
docs.advanced_settings.startTranslateAft: If true, the translator will switch to "only database translate" mode after completing the preliminary scan.
Purpose: Automatic transition to translation mode after prescan.
docs.advanced_settings.title: Advanced settings
docs.advanced_settings.tlsMinorVersion.e: Example: {"Chrome": [1, 3]} - TLS1.1 and TLS1.3 protocols are allowed
docs.advanced_settings.tlsMinorVersion.p: Purpose: Specify valid TLS versions for network requests.
docs.advanced_settings.tlsMinorVersion.v: A JSON object where the key is the browser name ("Chrome", "Yandex", "Edge") and the value is an array of valid minor versions of TLS (0, 1, 2, 3)
docs.advanced_settings.useMinimizeButton: Whether to show a small "maximize GUI" button in the corner of the screen when the main window is minimized. Allows you to return the interface by clicking the mouse on the icon, and not just through the key combination.
docs.advanced_settings.useProxies.name: useProxies
docs.advanced_settings.useProxies.protoc: Supported protocols: HTTP, HTTPS, SOCKS5 and other available protocols.
docs.advanced_settings.useProxies.value3: null - proxies are used by AutoProxy, but are not included in all services, but in those selected by the developer
docs.advanced_settings.useProxies.value4: An array of the user’s own proxies in the format: ["socks5://127.0.0.1:12345", "https://some.proxies.org:12345"]
docs.advanced_settings.useProxyInSeleniu: The setting only applies if proxies are enabled in one form or another in the useProxies parameter. Otherwise, the setting is ignored.
Purpose: Using a proxy in the Selenium browser.
docs.api_settings.apiData.deepL.title: deepL
docs.api_settings.apiData.name: apiData
docs.api_settings.apiData.purpose: Purpose: Data for accessing the API of translation services.
docs.api_settings.title: API settings
docs.basic_settings._debug_mode.importan: Important: Include only upon request for technical support. Error reports will not be accepted when this mode is enabled on its own.
docs.basic_settings._debug_mode.name: _debug_mode
docs.basic_settings._debug_mode.purpose: Purpose: Debug mode for the Translator3000 developer.
docs.basic_settings.directionOfTranslati: Note: If null is specified, the translator will try to define the target language automatically. However, for faster and more accurate operation, it is recommended to specify the language explicitly.
Language name in English or language code (the format is the same as in gameLanguage), or null
docs.basic_settings.gameLanguage.name: gameLanguage
docs.basic_settings.gameLanguage.note: Note: If null is specified, the translator will try to determine the game language automatically. However, for faster and more accurate operation, it is recommended to specify the language explicitly.
docs.basic_settings.gameLanguage.purpose: Purpose: The source language of the game from which the translation is performed.
docs.basic_settings.gameLanguage.values: Language name in English or language code (e.g. "en_GB", "ru_RU", "ja_JP"), or null
docs.basic_settings.modeOnStartup.name: modeOnStartup
docs.basic_settings.modeOnStartup.value3: "db_only" - translation mode only from the database
docs.basic_settings.modeOnStartup.value4: "realtime" - real-time translation mode with access to the network
docs.basic_settings.modeOnStartup.warnin: Attention: In most cases, this parameter should not be changed from the value "off". It is better to enable the mode through the translator's graphical interface.
docs.basic_settings.title: Basic settings
docs.disclaimer.missing_params: In the current version of the program, you may not have some of the parameters specified in this documentation. This means that they will appear in future versions of the program.
docs.disclaimer.title: Important note
docs.disclaimer.update_note: Documentation can be updated before new versions of the program are released. If you do not find a parameter in your version of Translator3000, it will be added in one of the next updates.
docs.disclaimer.warning: Attention! This documentation describes all possible configuration options for Translator3000.
docs.display_settings.displayAlternateTr: If true - shows a window with alternative translation options from other services (if the translation is in the database).
For the convenience of frequent use of this function, it is recommended to configure the corresponding hotkeys via graphical interface.
docs.display_settings.displayOriginal.ho: For the convenience of frequent use of this function, it is recommended to configure the corresponding hotkeys via graphical interface.
docs.display_settings.displayOriginal.pu: Purpose: Display a window with the original text during the game.
docs.display_settings.displayOriginal.va: "choice_menu_only" - window is displayed only for the selection menu
If true - the original text is shown in the history, if false - translated.
Purpose: Display text in the game dialog history.
docs.display_settings.showEditWindow.des: Allows the user to correct machine translation in real time.
docs.display_settings.showEditWindow.pur: Purpose: Displays the window for editing translated text.
docs.display_settings.title: Display settings
Purpose: Fixes a multiple call issue renpy.restart_interaction() that occurs because the developer leaves the config.developer parameter enabled in the release version. The option disables the option.
docs.fix_options._fixOptions.fixFont.pur: Purpose: Fixes a problem in games where the style of the text displayed is forced to change so that the font selected by the user is not used, which leads to the display of "squares" instead of text. The option uses an alternative method of changing the text font.
docs.fix_options._fixOptions.fixGUI.name: fixGUI
docs.fix_options._fixOptions.fixGUI.purp: Purpose: Fixes a problem in games where the layer on which the translator is displayed is suppressed. The option disables layer suppression, if any.
docs.fix_options._fixOptions.forceRestar: Purpose: If enabled, changes behavior in "No freeze" mode, forcing the interface to be redrawn after each translation update. If disabled, the interface is redrawn selectively, depending on the conditions. Helps in games where text is displayed in non-standard ways.
docs.fix_options._fixOptions.important: Important: Without specific technical support, it is not recommended to change anything at all in this section. These options are designed to fix specific problems in individual games and can cause the program to run unstable if used incorrectly.
docs.fix_options._fixOptions.name: _fixOptions
docs.fix_options._fixOptions.purpose: Purpose: Special options to fix various problems in specific games.
docs.fix_options.title: Problem correction options
docs.footer.notice: Documentation can be updated before new versions of the program are released
docs.gui_note.description: When you start the game with Translator3000 activated, a convenient graphical menu appears where you can configure all the basic parameters by simply selecting from the list.
docs.gui_note.emphasis: Translator3000 is much more convenient to configure via a graphical interface!
docs.gui_note.link: A detailed description of all GUI elements is available in separate GUI documentation.
docs.gui_note.purpose: The configuration file described in this documentation is mainly for:
docs.gui_note.purpose1: General information content about the capabilities of the program
docs.gui_note.purpose2: Advanced users who prefer manual configuration
docs.gui_note.purpose3: Specific cases when the graphical interface is not available
docs.gui_note.recommendation: We recommend that you first try setting up a translator via the graphical interface!
docs.gui_note.title: A simple way to set up
docs.header.subtitle: Translator of visual novels on the Ren'Py engine with easy installation and a user-friendly interface!
docs.header.title: Translator3000
docs.hotkeys.keys.databaseTranslateSwitc: Purpose: Switch between "translation from database only" and "disabled" modes.
docs.hotkeys.keys.displayAlternateTransl: Purpose: Show/hide alternative translation options (similar to the option in the main settings).
docs.hotkeys.keys.displayOriginal.purpos: Purpose: Show/hide original text (similar to the option in the main settings).
docs.hotkeys.keys.displayOriginal.title: displayOriginal
docs.hotkeys.keys.editWindow.purpose: Purpose: Show/hide the text editing window (similar to the "showEditWindow" parameter in the main settings).
docs.hotkeys.keys.editWindow.title: editWindow
docs.hotkeys.keys.forceRestart.purpose: Purpose: Force update of the current game screen (similar to the "Update Page" function in the graphical interface).
docs.hotkeys.keys.forceRestart.title: forceRestart
docs.hotkeys.keys.forceRestart.usage: Use: Useful in cases where the screen for some reason has not been updated after translation and displays untranslated text. Allows you to force the interface to be redrawn.
docs.hotkeys.keys.format2: String with key - the specified key is used
docs.hotkeys.keys.format3: An object with the keys "extraKeys" and "mainKey" - "extraKeys" is an array of modifiers, "mainKey" is the main key
docs.hotkeys.keys.guiShow.extraKeys: "extraKeys" is an array of modifiers (one or more of "alt", "meta", "shift", "ctrl")
docs.hotkeys.keys.guiShow.mainKey: "mainKey" is the main key in pygame format
docs.hotkeys.keys.guiShow.note: Note: All keys are specified in pygame format. Letter keys must begin with the prefix "K_" and be in uppercase (for example, "K_T", "K_A", "K_F1").
docs.hotkeys.keys.guiShow.title: guiShow
docs.hotkeys.keys.name: keys
docs.hotkeys.note: Note: In most cases, it is more convenient to configure keys via a graphical interface. The information here is presented for review.
docs.hotkeys.title: Hotkeys
docs.intro.description: Translator3000 — is a convenient automatic translator of visual novels made on the Ren'Py engine with an easy installation and a user-friendly interface! It uses modern translation services and a cloud database system to provide quality translation.
docs.intro.title: Introduction
docs.meta.title: Translator3000 - Documentation
docs.nav.gui_note: A simple way to set up
docs.support.community_description: Discuss translations, share databases and get help:
docs.support.subscription_description: To gain access to Translator3000, you must subscribe to one of the platforms:
docs.support.subscription_note: The subscription provides access to the latest versions of the program, updates and technical support.
docs.support.title: Access to the program
docs.terms.api.description: Application programming interface. In the context of Translator3000 — this is a way for a program to interact with various machine translation services.
docs.terms.api.name: API (Application Programming Interface)
docs.terms.autoproxy.description: Automatic proxy system used to bypass geographic restrictions and ensure privacy. Can be used to access translation services blocked in certain regions.
docs.terms.autoproxy.name: AutoProxy
docs.terms.cloud_db.description: Translation sharing system. Users who have already translated the game can share their translation database via Telegram-channel or Discord. This allows other users to instantly receive a finished translation of the game without waiting.
docs.terms.cloud_db.link: You can view translations already available in the database here.
docs.terms.cloud_db.name: Cloud database (DB)
docs.terms.prescan.description: Translator mode, in which the program collects all text strings from the game in advance and translates them. Prescan can take a long time, but after it is completed, the user receives a fully translated game without having to wait for the translation of each phrase during the game.
docs.terms.prescan.name: Prescan (Preliminary scan)
docs.terms.renpy.description: Engine for creating visual novels and games with storytelling. Translator3000 specializes in working with games built on this engine.
docs.terms.renpy.name: Ren'Py
docs.terms.selenium.description: Web browser automation tool. Translator3000 is used to work with some translation services by emulating the actions of a real user in the browser.
docs.terms.selenium.name: Selenium
docs.terms.title: Terms and concepts
docs.terms.tls.description: A transport layer protection protocol that ensures secure data transfer between the program and translation services. TLS version settings affect compatibility with various services.
docs.terms.tls.name: TLS (Transport Layer Security)
":auto:" - the font is downloaded automatically depending on the translation language
docs.text_options.extraTextOptions.name: extraTextOptions
docs.text_options.extraTextOptions.outli: Format: Array with arrays of 4 elements: [Size, color in HEX, offset in X, offset in Y]
docs.text_options.extraTextOptions.purpo: Purpose: Additional options for displaying text in the game.
docs.text_options.title: Additional text settings
docs.translation_settings.autoSwitchOnAv: If the cloud database translation service and the translation service selected by the user are different, then when you enable this parameter, you will switch to the service whose database is available in the cloud.
Purpose: Automatically switch to cloud database translation service.
docs.translation_settings.googleHost.not: Note: Used in countries where there are problems accessing the main Google service. In most cases does not require modification.
docs.translation_settings.requestsFreque: Note: For some services where the frequency is severely limited, this setting is ignored.
Purpose: Maximum permissible frequency of calls to the translation service.
docs.translation_settings.splitTextAsSen: If true - sentences will be reduced to readable form (final characters outside the sentence are removed).
Attention: In most cases, this parameter is not needed. Include only upon recommendation of technical support.
docs.translation_settings.title: Translation settings
docs.translation_settings.translationSer: Important feature: You can specify not one value, but an array of valid values. In this case, if one of the services causes an error, the next one on the list will be used sequentially.
Note: The service "deepl_official" functions only if there is a valid API key in the section apiData.deepL.authKey.
docs.translation_settings.useNoFreezeLog: Useful for real-time mode. To translate a string, it does not stop the main thread until the translation is completed, but creates a parallel thread, and the game does not freeze, but simply shows the inscription "wait" until the translation is completed.
docs.translation_settings.workMethod.val: "dialogueOnly" - translation of dialogues and selection menu only (recommended)
"allText" - an attempt to translate all text on the screen (beta mode)
docs.translation_settings.workMethod.war: Attention: "AllText" mode is not recommended for use. Include only as a last resort and with the advice of technical support.
faq.compatibility.a: How a game is made depends on the developer. Depending on the implementation, there may be conflicts in individual games. Unfortunately, it will not be possible to implement compatibility with all games.
faq.compatibility.q: The game does not translate/does not start/works incorrectly
faq.gui.a: Key combination Alt + ~ (tilde). If desired, this combination can be changed in the settings.
faq.gui.q: How to call the translator GUI?
faq.manual_edit.a: Yes, Translator3000 has a function for manually editing translations through a special window for edited text. However, it is important to understand: if you make manual edits to the translation database or use the manual editing function, then if errors occur, tracebacks and error reports will not be accepted. Manual editing is done at your own risk.
faq.mobile.a: No. The translator is only available for desktop versions of Windows, Linux and macOS. Mobile platforms and emulators are not supported.
faq.mobile.q: Is there a Translator3000 for Android, iOS or other mobile systems?
faq.no_answer.a:
Look at the topics with questions in the Discord community or Telegram - most likely, they have already answered a similar question. If there is no answer, ask your question in one of these communities.

Important: ask questions in general question channels, not in private messages. This will help other users with similar problems.
faq.no_answer.q: I didn't find an answer to my question
faq.personal_contact.a: No. All issues are resolved only through official technical support channels in Discord and Telegram.
faq.personal_contact.q: I still don’t understand something, but I don’t want to write to technical support. Can I write to you personally?
faq.report_bug.a:
Error messages are accepted only for the latest current version.
Prepare:
• Log file (activate debug mode)
• Information about settings
• traceback.txt file (if any)
• Description of actions leading to the error

Ask questions in Discord or Telegram.
faq.support_notice.text: All error reports and technical support are provided only for the latest current version and only for it without alternatives or exceptions. This is because work is constantly underway on the translator, and the error that occurred in earlier versions may no longer be present in later ones.
faq.support_notice.title: Important information about support
faq.tags_removal.a:
Translator3000 removes Ren'Py tags (color, italics, bold text, as well as text tags like {w}/{nw} and the like) for an important reason: these tags cannot be escaped when accessing the translation service. The service can convert the tag {color=...} to {цвет=...}, which will lead to an error.

Although it would be possible to translate the text in parts (before and after tags), this would greatly deteriorate the quality of the translation, since the words would be translated without taking into account the full context.

Therefore, it was decided to remove the tags to ensure the correct operation of the translator.
faq.tags_removal.q: Why does the translator remove tags from the game?
faq.title: Frequent questions
faq.versions.a:
Trial version: available to everyone with limited functionality - download on GitHub
Main version: full functionality with periodic updates, available by subscription to Boosty and Patreon
faq.versions.q: What versions of the translator exist?
faq.what_is.a: Translator3000 is an automatic translator of games (novels) made on the Ren'Py engine, with easy installation and a user-friendly interface. Do you want to read the novel, but it doesn’t have a translation into your language? All you need to do is copy the Translator3000.rpa file to the game folder.
features.active_community.desc: Join our community, share translations and get help.
features.active_community.title: 👥 Active Community
features.convenient_ui.desc: The graphical interface is right in the game for comfortable translation settings.
features.convenient_ui.title: 🎮 User-friendly interface
features.easy_install.desc: Just copy one file to the game folder - no complicated settings.
features.easy_install.title: 🚀 Easy installation
features.project_support.desc: Subscription access helps develop the project and add new features.
features.project_support.title: ❤️ Project support
features.title: Advantages
footer.subscription: The project is available by subscription to Boosty and Patreon.
gui.center_left.backup_db.features: features: The translator automatically creates backups when saving translations, so in most cases manual backup creation is not required. However, this button is available for forced backup if necessary.
gui.center_left.backup_db.name: Make a backup database
gui.center_left.backup_db.purpose: Purpose: Create a backup copy of the translation database.
gui.center_left.clear_all_cache.name: Clear all translation cache
gui.center_left.clear_all_cache.purpose: Purpose: Completely clear all saved translations for all games.
gui.center_left.clear_all_cache.warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone. All saved translations will be permanently deleted.
gui.center_left.clear_cache.description: Useful for translation problems or to free up disk space.
gui.center_left.clear_cache.name: Clear game translation cache
gui.center_left.clear_cache.purpose: Purpose: Remove saved translations for the current game.
gui.center_left.clear_cache.warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone. All saved translations for the current game will be permanently deleted.
gui.center_left.edit_variables.capabilit: Adjustment of game currency and resources
gui.center_left.edit_variables.name: Edit game variables
gui.center_left.edit_variables.note: Note: This feature is made at the request of subscribers and is not directly related to the translation. It can be useful for those who want to save time on farming resources or quickly improve relationships with characters.
gui.center_left.edit_variables.purpose: Purpose: Advanced function for changing game variables.
gui.center_left.edit_window.description: Allows you to correct translation inaccuracies in real time during the game.
gui.center_left.edit_window.important: Important note: When using the manual editing function, the user loses the right to technical support. Error reports from users who made changes to translations manually will not be accepted.
gui.center_left.edit_window.name: Display the text editing window
gui.center_left.edit_window.purpose: Purpose: Opens a special window for manual editing of machine translation.
gui.center_left.edit_window.tip: Tip: For ease of frequent use of this function, you can assign a combination of hotkeys in the translator settings.
gui.center_left.statistics.description: Includes information about the number of strings translated, translation services used, and other useful statistics.
gui.center_left.statistics.name: Statistics
gui.center_left.statistics.purpose: Purpose: View statistics for games launched with Translator3000.
gui.center_left.support_buttons.boosty_d: Opens the project page to Boosty
gui.center_left.support_buttons.name: Developer support buttons
gui.center_left.support_buttons.note: The subscription gives access to the full version of Translator3000 with regular updates and technical support.
gui.center_left.support_buttons.patreon_: Opens the project page to Patreon
gui.center_left.support_buttons.purpose: Purpose: Direct access to project support pages.
gui.center_left.title: Central group - Left part
gui.center_left.translator_settings.adva: Graphical interface advantage: All these settings are presented in a convenient visual format with explanations, which greatly simplifies the translator configuration compared to manually editing the settings file.
gui.center_left.translator_settings.bool: Substitute variables from the loaded database: addVariablesFromDB
Use the visible translator display button: useMinimizeButton
Use an alternative sorting method in the pre-scan: alternativeSortMethod
gui.center_left.translator_settings.disp: Matches the parameter displayOriginal with the ability to configure hotkeys for quick switching.
gui.center_left.translator_settings.game: Source game language: Corresponds to the parameter gameLanguage
gui.center_left.translator_settings.hotk: Corresponds to the object keys, but with a simplified interface - you can select a combination by directly pressing the desired keys, without the need to enter text commands.
gui.center_left.translator_settings.name: Translator settings
gui.center_left.translator_settings.noti: In some cases (for example, when a prescan is completed), the translator sends notifications via the Windows API, which can be disabled. If the user accidentally disables the desired notification, this feature allows you to reset settings and restore the display of all notifications.
gui.center_left.translator_settings.purp: Purpose: Access advanced and fine-tuning Translator3000 translation and functionality.
gui.center_left.translator_settings.text: Corresponds to the parameter: extraTextOptions in the configuration file
Allows you to visually customize the appearance of the displayed text in the game.
gui.center_left.translator_settings.tran: Translation direction: Corresponds to the parameter directionOfTranslation
gui.center_right.rescan_button.applicati: Application: Particularly useful in cases where the prescan was performed before entering dynamic data (such as the player's name), and it is necessary to translate strings with this data.
gui.center_right.rescan_button.name: Restarting the pre-scan
gui.center_right.social_buttons.discord_: Join Discord community to discuss, help, and share translations.
gui.center_right.social_buttons.name: Social networks of the project
gui.center_right.social_buttons.note: The Communities are an excellent place to receive assistance, exchange experience and access ready-made translation bases.
gui.center_right.social_buttons.telegram: Subscribe to Telegram channel for news and updates.
gui.center_right.title: Central group - Right side
gui.center_right.version_info.name: Version information
gui.center_right.version_info.purpose: Purpose: Displays the current version of Translator3000 and information about the running game.
gui.center_right.work_modes.db_only_desc: Description: Translation mode exclusively from the database.
gui.center_right.work_modes.db_only_feat: Does not fulfill network requests to translation services
Displays the original text if no translation is found in the database
It works as quickly as possible as it does not require an Internet connection
gui.center_right.work_modes.name: Translator operating modes
gui.center_right.work_modes.off_desc: Description: The translator is completely disabled and does not perform any actions.
gui.center_right.work_modes.off_note: The game operates in its original mode without the intervention of a translator.
gui.center_right.work_modes.prescan_beha: If the startTranslateAfterPrescan setting is enabled, it automatically switches to "DB Only" mode
If the setting is disabled, it remains in its current state
gui.center_right.work_modes.prescan_desc: Description: A mode in which the program collects all text strings from the game in advance and translates them.
gui.center_right.work_modes.prescan_feat: May take a long time depending on the volume of text
Once completed, provides a fully translated game
Eliminates the need to wait for translation during the game
Creates a file to export to a cloud database
gui.center_right.work_modes.prescan_loca: Location of the database file: In the game folder or in the directory specified in the databaseDir parameter of the configuration file.
gui.center_right.work_modes.prescan_tech: More information about the technical aspects of each mode can be found in documentation on basic settings.
gui.center_right.work_modes.realtime_fea: First, it checks for the presence of a translation in the local database
In the absence of translation, accesses network services
Saves received translations to a database for later use
gui.center_right.work_modes.realtime_net: If enabled, access the network in a separate stream (the game does not freeze)
If disabled, circulation in the main stream (short-term freezes are possible)
gui.footer.notice: Documentation can be updated before new versions of the program are released
gui.header.subtitle: Translator GUI
gui.header.title: Translator3000
gui.intro.p1: The Translator3000 GUI provides a convenient way to configure all translation settings without having to edit configuration files. The interface is available when playing the key combination Alt + ~ (tilde).
gui.intro.p2: This documentation complements basic configuration documentation by providing visual guidance on how to use the Translator3000 interface.
gui.intro.recommendation: Recommendation: For most users, GUI configuration is the preferred method as it is intuitive and does not require knowledge of technical details.
gui.intro.title: Introduction
gui.meta.title: Translator3000 - Graphical interface
gui.top_left.back_button.function1: On the settings pages - return to the previous page
gui.top_left.back_button.function2: On the main page - minimizing the interface window
gui.top_left.back_button.name: Back/Hide
gui.top_left.back_button.note: Note: With the useMinimizeButton option enabled in the settings, this button will remain the only one visible on the screen when minimized and will be used to maximize the settings window.
gui.top_left.back_button.purpose: Purpose: Universal button for navigation and window control.
gui.top_left.help_button.description: Allows you to quickly access complete documentation without interrupting gameplay.
gui.top_left.help_button.name: Help
gui.top_left.help_button.purpose: Purpose: Opens documentation for Translator3000 in the default browser.
gui.top_left.refresh_button.name: Refresh page
gui.top_left.refresh_button.note: Note: For this function, you can configure the hotkey combination through the parameter forceRestart in the object keys of the configuration file.
gui.top_left.refresh_button.purpose: Purpose: Forced update of the current game screen.
gui.top_left.refresh_button.usage: Use: In most cases, automatic updating works correctly, but if for some reason the screen has not been updated after translation and displays untranslated text, this button allows you to force the interface to be redrawn.
gui.top_left.theme_button.name: Toggle topic
gui.top_left.theme_button.note: The theme setting only affects the Translator3000 interface and does not change the design of the game itself.
gui.top_left.theme_button.purpose: Purpose: Change the color scheme of the translator interface.
gui.top_left.title: Left top group of buttons
gui.top_right.language_button.important: Important: This setting only changes the language of the translator's controls, not the game language or translation direction.
gui.top_right.language_button.name: Toggle language
gui.top_right.messages_button.descriptio: Through this window, users receive important notifications about updates, changes in the operation of services and other useful information.
gui.top_right.messages_button.faq: Answers to frequent questions are available on home page.
gui.top_right.messages_button.name: Messages
gui.top_right.messages_button.purpose: Purpose: Display or hide a message window from the Translator3000 team.
gui.top_right.size_controls.description: Enables buttons to increase, decrease and restore the standard interface window size.
gui.top_right.size_controls.name: Size controls
gui.top_right.size_controls.tip: Tip: Right-clicking on the zoom button (+) returns the window to its standard size.
gui.top_right.title: Upper right group
gui.top_right.transparency_bar.descripti: Allows you to make the interface more or less transparent for comfortable combination with the gameplay.
gui.top_right.transparency_bar.name: Transparency regulator
gui.top_right.transparency_bar.purpose: Purpose: Configure the transparency level of the translator settings window.
header.subtitle: Automatic translator of games made on the Ren'Py engine, with easy installation and a user-friendly interface.
header.title: Translator3000
hero.description: Download Translator3000.rpa file and play your favorite novel in your language
hero.title: Translate visual novels easily
meta.title: Translator3000 - Visual Novel Translator for Ren'Py
steps.step1.desc: Download Translator3000.rpa and copy the file to the "game" folder in the game directory
steps.step1.title: 1. Install
steps.step2.desc: Start the game - the translator interface will appear when you start a new game or load a save
steps.step2.title: 2. Launch it
steps.step3.desc: In the GUI, set up the translation as you like
steps.step3.title: 3. Set it up
steps.title: How it works
